name: cloning

the process of creating an exact copy of a plant or animal by using its cells: animal/human cloning Cloning is a type of genetic engineering that uses cells from one organism to create a second living organism that is genetically identical to the first. See
clone
More examplesFewer examplesScientists have long been interested in human cloning.Reproductive cloning is meant to create genetically identical organisms.Some people are still freaked out by cloning.
